Html:
Hello,
I'm building Windows Phone 8 app using MVVM Light. So far, so good.
However, when I used EventToCommand, I get multiple errors. One similar question is there on StackOverflow http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11510233/eventtocommand-not-working-when-migrate-to-v4-for-sl5, but sadly it doesn't solve my problem.! It automatically adds following reference:
xmlns:command1="http://www.galasoft.ch/mvvmlight"
Let me know if I'm missing anything or doing something wrong.

Thanks in advance.
Mayur Tendulkar
